title: All Ball - ESPN College Basketball Analyst Fran Fraschilla on Trae Young's Explosion, Rebuilding Ben Simmons, Mavs/Luka Issues
itunes:title: All Ball - ESPN College Basketball Analyst Fran Fraschilla on Trae Young's Explosion, Rebuilding Ben Simmons, Mavs/Luka Issues
description:
In this episode, Doug sits down with ESPN basketball analyst Fran Fraschilla to discuss the NBA explosion of Trae Young, the postseason collapse of Ben Simmons, how to fix him, how the Mavericks can keep Luka Doncic happy enough to stick around, his take on the DeAndre Ayton buzzer beater in Game 2 of the Western Conference Finals, and which international teams have a chance to beat Team USA in the next Olympics, and some quick scouting reports on the top prospects in this year's NBA draft. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
